description: Teleports the player to the first room of the current floor.
传送到当前层的初始房间
title: O - The Fool

description: For the current room, tears now have the Spoon Bender effect, which allows them to curve towards enemies and gives them a purple appearance.
角色子弹在当前房间获得跟踪效果
title: I - The Magician
pickup: May you never miss your goal

description: Summons Mom's foot which will stomp on a random enemy in the current room, dealing 300 damage.
If no enemies are in the current room, the foot will target Isaac (and do damage if it hits), however it can be used to break rocks.
在当前房间召唤妈腿,对敌人造成 300 点伤害
如果当前房间没有敌人,则妈腿会攻击角色
title: II - The High Priestess

description: Gives the player the Whore of Babylon effect for the current room, increasing damage and speed.
在当前房间获得 Whore of Babylon(巴比伦娼妇)效果,增加伤害和移速
title: III - The Empress

description: Teleports the player to the Boss room on the current floor.
传送到当前层的 Boss 房
title: IV - The Emperor

description: Spawns 2 Soul hearts on the floor.
在地上掉落两个魂心
title: V - The Hierophant

description: Spawns 2 red hearts on the floor.
在地上掉落两个红心
title: VI - The Lovers
pickup: May you prosper and be in good health

description: Grants the same effect as 'My Little Unicorn', which makes Isaac invincible and deal 40 contact damage to enemies per hit.
获得 My Little Unicorn(我的小独角)的效果,一定时间无敌并对接触到的敌人造成 40 点 伤害
title: VII - The Chariot

description: Spawns 1 bomb, 1 key, 1 coin, 1 heart, which can be random variants of each.
在地上掉落炸弹、钥匙、硬币、红心各一个
这些基础掉落物可能会被替换,如红心可能会被替换成魂心等
title: VIII - Justice

description: Teleports the player to the Shop.
On or below the Womb, this acts as a random teleport, since there are no shops on those floors.
传送到当前层的商店
如果当前层无商店,则随机传送到一个房间
title: IX - The Hermit
pickup: May you see what life has to offer

description: Spawns a Slot Machine or a Fortune Machine.
生成一个赌博机或预言机
title: X - Wheel of Fortune

description: Gives the player the Magic Mushroom effect, which increasing size and all stats by 1 for the current room.
If you use the Strength card with 12 heart containers, it will take you down to 11 when you leave the room.
角色在当前房间获得 Magic Mushroom(魔法菇)效果,增加一个心之容器并且全属性上 升
如果角色的心之容器有 12 个,则使用该卡片后出房间,心之容器将变为 11 个
title: XI - Strength

description: Gives the player the flying effect for the current room, allowing the player to fly over obstacles in the room.
This card is useless if you have any item which allows you to permanently fly.
角色在当前房间获得飞行能力
title: XII - The Hanged Man

description: Deals 40 damage to all enemies in the room in a similar style to the Necronomicon.
在当前房间触发 Necronomicon(死灵书)效果,对房间内敌人造成 40 点伤害
title: XIII - Death
pickup: Lay waste to all that oppose you

description: Spawns a Blood Donation Machine.
生成一个卖血机
【DLC】在 Greed Mode(贪婪模式)中,生成一个恶魔乞丐
title: XIV - Temperance
pickup: May you be pure in heart

description: Gives the Book of Belial effect for the current room, increasing damage.
在当前房间触发 Book of Belial(贝利尔之书)的效果,角色伤害增加
title: XV - The Devil
pickup: Revel in the power of your darkness

description: Spawns some troll bombs at random locations in the current room.
Each bomb deals 60 damage (normal bomb damage.
在当前房间触发 Anarchist Cookbook(无政府主义者食谱)效果,在地上生成 6 个即爆炸 弹
title: XVI - The Tower

description: Teleports the player to the Item Room.
On or below the Womb, this acts as a random teleport, since there are no item rooms on those floors.
传送到当前层的宝物房
如果当前层无宝物房,则随机传送到一个房间
title: XVII - The Stars
pickup: May you find what you desire

description: Teleports the player to the Secret Room.
传送到当前层的隐藏房
如果当前层无隐藏房(如蓝子宫层),则随机传送到一个房间
title: XVIII - The Moon
pickup: May you find all you have lost

description: A card with three uses: A full heal, deals 100 damage to all enemies in the current room and reveals the entire map for the current floor (Treasure Map + The Compass).
回复所有红心
对当前房间敌人造成 100 点伤害
触发 Treasure Map(藏宝图)和 The Compass(指南针)的效果,并显示当前层隐藏房位 置(当有 Curse of Darkness(黑暗诅咒)时无效)
title: XIX - The Sun
pickup: May the light heal and enlighten you

description: Spawns a beggar.
Has a chance to be a demon beggar.
Killing a Devil Beggar, Key Master, or Shell Game Beggar gives you an increased chance of finding Angel rooms instead of Devil rooms. See the dedicated Devil room page for more details.
生成一个乞丐
有一定几率生成恶魔乞丐
有非常小的几率生成钥匙乞丐
【DLC】有极其微小的几率生成炸弹乞丐
title: XX - Judgement

description: Reveals the entire map and shows the icons for every room which has one.
This is completely useless if you currently have both the Treasure Map and The Compass.
触发 Treasure Map(藏宝图)和 The Compass(指南针)的效果,并显示当前层隐藏房位 置
当有 Curse of Darkness(黑暗诅咒)时无效
title: XXI - The World

description: Doubles the number of Bombs you have.
If you have no bombs, it gives you two.
炸弹 X2
如果没有炸弹,则炸弹+2
title: 2 of Clubs

description: Doubles the number of coins you have.
If you have no coins, it gives you two.
硬币 X2
如果没有硬币,则硬币+2
title: 2 of Diamonds

description: Doubles the number of keys you have.
If you have no keys, it gives you two.
钥匙 X2
如果没有钥匙,则钥匙+2
title: 2 of Spades

description: Doubles your current red hearts up to full health.
If you have half a heart left, the card recovers your first two heart containers.
This card is useless for the Blue Baby.
红心 X2
title: 2 of Hearts

description: Teleports you to the Devil Deal Room on the current floor.
传送到当前层的恶魔房/天使房
title: The Joker

description: When used, this rune will destroy all breakable objects in the current room, such as poop, rocks and skulls.
摧毁当前房间所有的可破坏障碍物
有可能开启隐藏房或超级隐藏房的门(待确认)
title: Rune of Hagalaz
unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #1 (Pitch Black).

description: When used this rune will double all pickups on the floor in the room.
Creates copies of pickups, even if you haven't purchased them yet.
Can be used to double the number of golden item chests in the first room of the final Chest floor.
复制当前房间的掉落物
无法复制 JERA 符文
在商店内复制的掉落物无需花钱购买(卡片、心、钥匙、炸弹等)
可以用来复制 The Chest(宝箱关)初始房间的四个金箱子以获得更多主被动道具
title: Rune of Jera
unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #2 (High Brow).

description: Creates a trapdoor on the floor (Same effect as We Need To Go Deeper).
触发 We Need To Go Deeper(再深入些)效果,在角色当前位置生成一个通往下一层的通 道或者地道入口
title: Rune of Ehwaz
unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #3 (Head Trauma).

description: Removes the curse which is in effect on the current floor.
Can also cure the effect of the Amnesia pill.
+1 Soul Heart.
移除当前层所有诅咒效果
可以移除 Amnesia(失忆症)胶囊或???胶囊带来的诅咒效果,但如果在使用该卡片后使 用了以上两种胶囊则诅咒效果仍会生效
魂心+1
title: Rune of Dagaz
unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #4 (Darkness Falls).

description: When used, reveals the entire map including all the secret room locations and other icon rooms.
完全显示当前层地图布局
当有 Curse of Darkness(黑暗诅咒)时无效
title: Rune of Ansuz
unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #5 (The Tank).

description: Rerolls all pedestal items in the current room (One time use of the D6).
使用后触发一次 D6 效果,重置当前房间的主被动道具
title: Rune of Perthro
unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #6 (Solar System).

description: Summons 3 blue friendly spiders and 3 blue flies.
生成三个蓝苍蝇和三个蓝蜘蛛
title: Rune of Berkano
unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #20 (Purist).

description: When used, gives you an invincibility effect which lasts for 30 seconds (much longer than normal invincibility effects).
在当前房间内获得无敌防护罩,持续 30 秒
title: Rune of Algiz
unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #8 (Cat Got Your Tongue).

description: When used, gives a random Mystic rune effect.
Possible effects include: Algiz, Ansuz, Berkano, Dagaz, Ehwaz, Hagalaz, Jera, Perthro.
使用后触发随机一个符文的效果
有25%几率在地上生成一个新的空白符文
title: Blank Rune
unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #30 (Guardian).

description: A card which can be thrown as a projectile directly infront of Isaac, instantly killing anything it hits.
...Yes that includes every boss in the game!
If thrown at a multi-phase boss like Satan, it will only kill that particular phase of the boss.
Will destroy rocks and poop in its path.
Can also be thrown against a door to open it (Doesn't work against Mega Satan's door).
使用时,会从角色位置飞出一张卡片,飞出方向为角色最后一次的移动方向
卡片接触到的任何敌人都会立即死亡,包括 boss
对于有明显多阶段的 boss(如 Satan 或 Mega Satan 等),该卡片只能秒杀他的其中一个阶 段
卡片接触到可破坏障碍物(石头和大便等)时会直接摧毁它们
卡片接触到普通的门时会使门被打开
title: Chaos Card
unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #9 (Demo Man).

description: When used, removes the price tag from all items in the current shop or devil deal, making everything free.
The effect of the Credit Card only lasts for the current room.
使用后,使当前房间物品下面的价格标签或心之容器标签消失(如商店或恶魔房),即角 色可以免费获得这些道具
title: Credit Card
unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #10 (Cursed!).

description: Displays a random cryptic message on the screen similar to the fortune machine ones. One of the following messages may show:
"Rooms may yield more than you expect"
"Some doors require a blessing. Carry them with you"
"The walls will harden over time. Time is the essence"
"Sleeping gatekeepers will need to be awoken with a loud sound"
A piece of paper is your guide"
Deny his gifts to attain your reward"
A dark market lies under your feet
Chub dislikes smoke!
使用后会显示一条和游戏有关的提示信息
title: Rules Card
unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #11 (Glass Cannon).

description: When used, fills the entire room with poop!
使当前房间充满大便
title: Card Against Humanity
unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #12 (When Life Gives You Lemons).

description: When used, instantly kills you and spawns 10 pickup on the floor.
Each of the 10 things spawned can be any type of consumable or sometimes a pedestal item (up to a maximum of 3 pedestal items).
Any pedestal item created by Suicide King will be related to the room where it was used, meaning that using it in the Angel room will spawn Angel room items.
使用后角色立即死亡并且在地上掉落十个掉落物或道具
道具生成与当前房间道具池有关
不要轻易使用该卡片,除非角色有额外的生命
title: Suicide King
unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #7 (Suicide King).

description: When used, will open all doors in the current room, similar to a one-time use of Dad's Key.
使用后触发 Dad's Key(爸爸的钥匙)效果,开启当前房间所有房门
当然对 Mega Satan(超级撒旦)的大金门也是有效的
title: Get Out Of Jail Free Card
unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #22 (Speed).

description: When used this card will activate a use of your spacebar item for free.
可以触发一次当前主动道具的效果
如果当前主动是 Blank Card(白卡),则使用后会被传送进 Error 房,并且白卡也会消失(如 果当前层没有 Error 房,则白卡消失并且生成一个 Error 房的 Shopkeeper)
title: ? Card

description: Gives a one-time use of the D6 and D20 effects at the same time.
使用后触发一次 D6+D20 效果,重置当前房间的主被动道具和掉落物
title: Dice Shard

description: When used will cause two of Mom's Hand to come down and grab a random enemy.
使用后落下两只妈手，随机拿走两个敌人
title: Emergency Contact
